title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can sign up and sign in securely through Clerk OAuth and manage their profiles correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page.
Register a new user using valid OAuth credentials.
Confirm successful account creation and redirection to personalized dashboard.
Sign out and navigate to login page.
Sign in with previously registered OAuth credentials.
Verify successful login and session persistence across browser reloads.
Access profile management page.
Update profile information and save changes.
Ensure updated profile data is correctly saved and displayed.

title: User Authentication Error Handling
description: Validate proper error messages and restrictions during authentication failures and invalid profile operations.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter incorrect OAuth credentials and attempt to login.
Confirm display of appropriate error message and no session created.
Attempt to register with an already used email.
Verify registration is prevented and a descriptive error is shown.
Edit profile with invalid data (e.g., invalid email format) and save.
Ensure validation errors are displayed and data is not saved.

title: Streaming Chat Interface Basic Flow
description: Ensure the streaming chat interface returns AI-generated token-by-token real-time responses to user queries.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to the chat interface.
Enter a valid research query into the chat input.
Observe the AI response streaming token-by-token without significant delays.
Verify the final response content is coherent, relevant, and complete.
Send multiple sequential queries.
Verify the chat correctly manages multiple turns with smooth streaming each time.

title: Streaming Chat Interface Interrupt and Recovery
description: Verify handling of stream interruptions and recovery to avoid response loss or corruption.

steps.description: Start a chat query and simulate network interruption mid-response stream.
Check that partial response is preserved, and an informative error message is displayed.
Retry sending the same query after network recovery.
Confirm that streaming resumes smoothly and produces the complete response.

title: Conversation Management: Creation, Switching, and Deletion
description: Validate the ability to create new conversations, switch between existing ones, assign AI-generated titles, and delete conversations.

steps.description: Initiate new conversation and enter several messages.
Verify AI generates a relevant conversation title automatically.
Create multiple conversations.
Switch between conversations.
Confirm the chat interface updates to display messages for the selected conversation.
Delete a conversation.
Ensure the conversation is removed from the list and cannot be accessed subsequently.

title: ArXiv Paper Search with Filters and Sorting
description: Test the ArXiv integration to perform academic paper searches with correct metadata extraction, category filtering, and result sorting.

steps.description: Navigate to the research paper search interface.
Enter a search query and apply category filters (e.g., Computer Science, Physics).
Submit search request.
Validate returned papers include correct metadata: title, authors, summary, published date.
Confirm results are filtered according to selected categories.
Sort results by relevance and then by submission date.
Verify that the sorting order is correctly applied for each method.

title: ArXiv Search Error Handling and Rate Limits
description: Ensure graceful handling of API errors, invalid queries, and rate limiting scenarios from the ArXiv integration.

steps.description: Submit an empty or malformed search query.
Verify that a user-friendly error message is shown.
Simulate ArXiv API rate limiting or unavailability.
Check that informative error notifications are displayed without application crashes.

title: PDF Upload and Multi-page Text Extraction
description: Verify users can upload multi-page PDF research documents and that the system extracts text correctly across all pages.

steps.description: Upload a multi-page PDF research document via the platform.
Confirm the file is successfully uploaded and stored securely.
Trigger PDF text extraction process.
Verify that text is correctly extracted from all pages, including footnotes and captions.
Check that the extracted text is accessible for searching and analysis in the platform.

title: PDF Retrieval and Extraction from Web URLs
description: Test handling of PDF documents loaded directly from web URLs with proper download, extraction, and error handling.

steps.description: Provide a valid web URL pointing to a publicly accessible PDF document.
Trigger the PDF fetch and extraction process.
Verify successful download and extraction of text content from the PDF.
Provide an invalid or inaccessible URL.
Ensure the system shows an appropriate error message without crashing.

title: LaTeX Document Generation with Math and Bibliography
description: Validate the generation of research papers using LaTeX templates including correct rendering of mathematical notation, bibliography, and timestamped PDF output files.

steps.description: Input research content that includes mathematical formulas and citations.
Trigger the LaTeX document generation process.
Verify the system creates a PDF file with accurate rendering of math notation and bibliography.
Confirm the generated PDF file includes a timestamp in the filename for versioning.
Open the generated PDF and check format, layout, and completeness.

title: File Upload and Download with Permission Checks
description: Ensure secure file upload and authenticated download functionality for stored PDFs with permission enforcement.

steps.description: Upload a PDF file while authenticated.
Verify successful file storage in Supabase and local fallback.
Attempt to download the file with authenticated session.
Confirm download succeeds with correct file integrity.
Attempt to download the file without authentication or with unauthorized user.
Verify download is blocked with appropriate error message.

title: Backend API Endpoint Security and Functional Verification
description: Test all protected and public backend API endpoints for correct authentication flow, error handling, and expected functional responses.

steps.description: Send API requests to protected endpoints without authentication.
Verify the API returns 401 Unauthorized errors.
Send authenticated requests to all protected endpoints with valid tokens.
Confirm API returns expected data or success messages.
Send malformed or invalid data requests.
Check API returns appropriate 4xx error codes with descriptive messages.

title: Conversation History Persistence Across Sessions
description: Assess whether conversation history and state persist correctly across user sessions and server restarts.

steps.description: Create and exchange messages in a research conversation.
Verify conversation and messages are saved in the database.
Sign out and sign in again with the same user account.
Confirm previous conversations and messages load correctly.
Simulate server restart.
Ensure conversation data remains intact and available after restart.

title: Performance Testing of Streaming Latency and Database Queries
description: Benchmark streaming chat response latency, database query times, and caching efficiency under typical and high load conditions.

steps.description: Measure time from user query submission to first token received in streaming chat.
Validate latency is within acceptable performance thresholds.
Execute common database queries such as conversation retrieval and check response time.
Confirm database queries respond efficiently and within expected limits.
Test conversation caching by repeatedly accessing the same session data.
Verify cache hits improve response times and perform smart truncation without data loss.

title: UI Component Behavior and Accessibility
description: Verify core UI components such as buttons, sidebar navigation, and chat interface are functional, usable, and accessible.

steps.description: Interact with UI buttons in various contexts and confirm expected actions trigger.
Check buttons display loading states and disable during processing.
Navigate through the sidebar menu to different sections of the platform.
Confirm correct page loads and navigation elements highlight active sections.
Perform keyboard navigation and access UI components for accessibility.
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and usable via keyboard and screen readers.
